comments:
Created an attachment (id=75096)
The report design that caused the problem

Hi,

I have a report with a bar chart in a group header. Preview and export to html is fine, but whenever I try to export it to pdf I get a NullPointerException (Stacktrace attached below).

If I remove the chart the export works.

It does not seem to be a general problem  of my environment, since I have other reports containing a bar chart that work. I tried using the eclipse Designer/Built in webviewer (pressing the "Print report as PDF"-Button) and standalone reporting engine, both with the same result.

Regards,
Stefan

Sorry, I attached the wrong report design
NPE in the org.eclipse.birt.report.engine package. Reassign to Engine team for further investigation.

Hi, Stefan
I cannot reproduce the bug without your data. I have tried some possible cases, but they all work well. If the data does not contain sensitive info, could you export the data from your database to a flat file, and attach it?

Albert,

sorry I was on holiday. Have you actually fixed the bug or do you still need test data to reproduce the bug?

Stefan
Yes, it has been fixed. pls help me to confirm it.

Albert,

it seems to be working using the All-in-one_snapshot (S20070824). So far it looks as being resolved. I could not verify the fix using the report engine package due to another problem, but I don't have the time to figure that out.

For me the problem is solved.
